MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH23 postcode area of Peebles and Gorebridge. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however in order to complete repairs to faulty equipment on our overhead line network near to Gladhouse Mains, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8.45pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.35pm on Tuesday 8th December 2020.
